message:
More than 250 Launch Darkly toggles are currently being served to the application. This payload size can have adverse affects across the platform. Consider removing launched or inactive toggles from the [Launch Darkly Project](- [Launch Darkly Default Project](https://app.launchdarkly.com/default/production/features?sort=creationDate)
 
[ Toggle Dashboard](https://app.datadoghq.com/dashboard/c96-hwz-djg/toggles?from_ts=1643120072204&to_ts=1643123672204&live=true) @slack-incidents
name: Launch Darkly Toggle count has exceeded threshold. Too many toggles are being served.
